meanings.sent1: She misfiled the important report in the wrong folder.
meanings.sent2: He always misfiles his paperwork when he's in a hurry.
meanings.sent3: The secretary misfiled the documents and accidentally created a paper maze.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumbled mess, like a misfiled cabinet of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misfiling can be costly and time-consuming.

meanings.sent1: The misfiled documents were hard to locate.
meanings.sent2: The misfiled papers caused confusion in the office.
meanings.sent3: The misfiled folder played hide-and-seek with the employee.
meanings.sent4: His misfiled memories were like scattered puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The misfiled box of papers resembled a chaotic jigsaw puzzle.
